programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (John Wayne) and his friend Jake (George Hayes) have to keep two crooks away from their gold.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) tries to tame his wife (Maureen O'Hara) amid a feud with settlers and trouble with Indians.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: A Quaker (Gail Russell) and her family reform a wounded outlaw (John Wayne) who has a killer on his trail.

programme.title: Texas City
programme.desc: Army gold shipments are being robbed and some insider is tipping off the outlaws as to the time and route. Johnny Mack Brown is called in and he teams up with Jim Kirby, an ex Army Officer who was kicked out when his shipment was robbed.

programme.title: West of the Rio Grande
programme.desc: Two-fisted cowboys fight for law and order in their encounters with outlaws.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: The greedy owners of a ghost town create rumors of a gold rush in order to stir up business.

programme.title: The Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: A cowboy (John Wayne) protects a girl (Sheila Terry) and her father (George Hayes) from a rustler and a sheriff.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (John Wayne) and his friend Jake (George Hayes) have to keep two crooks away from their gold.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A Ponderosa ranch hand faces charges of killing the wife of the U.S. marshal (Claude Akins) who came to arrest him.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A disabled New Orleans police inspector (Lloyd Nolan) comes to arrest Ben on a 20-year-old murder charge.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When two rangers arrive to help the newspaper editor of Wilcox, they find out he has been lynched and is hanging from a tree.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Rynning hires an Apache tracker to find a gang of desperadoes committing murder and robbery across the entire Arizona Territory.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: A member of the notorious Wild Bunch bandit gang escapes from Ranger Clint Travis' custody, resulting in his being fired. Furious, Travis sets out to take on the whole gang.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Cattle rustling leads to the cancellation of a contract to supply beef for railroad construction crews, and Matt Clark is called in to stop it.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Two criminals vow to fight the railroad when their homestead is threatened.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro accompany Sen. Fowler to Monterey for security reasons.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro discover the body of Tad Morton's father.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Outlaw Huggard impersonates the new sheriff of Green Valley to gain access to gold.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Tom Phillips is framed for murder because of his attempt to outlaw gambling.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit and El Toro fight a bank robber and his gang.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: An artist is wounded and has his winning national lottery ticket stolen.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Trigger Dawson and his gang kidnap a young girl for ransom.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit investigates crooked horse-racing.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kit Carson
programme.desc: Kit (Bill Williams) is sent to investigate a series of postal holdups.

programme.title: Springtime In Texas
programme.desc: Pete Grant controls the town of Pecos and it's Mayor and Marshal. When Jimmy, Denny, and Lasses arrive they soon find themselves in trouble.

programme.title: Frontier Feud
programme.desc: An unruly band of claim-jumpers causes some hot and heavy disputes.

programme.title: The Man From Utah
programme.desc: A tough cowboy has a head-to-head confrontation with a gang of outlaws using a rodeo as its base of operations.

programme.title: Randy Rides Alone
programme.desc: Government agent Randy Bowers (John Wayne) is accused of shooting up a saloon and has to escape from the jail to find the man behind the murders.

programme.title: Gallowwalkers
programme.desc: Aman (Wesley Snipes) is cursed in the womb, and as an adult, anyone he kills rises as the walking dead. Being relentlessly pursued, the gunfighter enlists the aid of a young warrior to confront the zombies.
